results.title: Type 2 diabetes increases and metformin reduces total, colorectal, liver and pancreatic cancer incidences in Taiwanese: a representative population prospective cohort study of 800,000 individuals
results.text_hl: We examined the possible @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ effect on total, @<m>DISEASE_Esophageal_and_Gastric_Varices</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004932 @@@esophageal, gastric, colorectal (CRC)@@@, @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@hepatocellular (HCC) and pancreatic cancers@@@ in a Taiwanese cohort.
